column4: that looks like some hardware issue ssh in while its alive and see how it goes, you say you want to use it as a server then I would install the server version of ubuntu - unless you need the screen and just see if it falls over, why not add a list of the hardware that is involved to the post - right down to mobo what pci is where - and theres a thing in the past some crazy things like the order of the PCI cards has caused me pain
Is there a program I can run that will report that sort of hardware things?
